about_the_game:
A Zombie survival game where you play as the zombie. Fight off the humans as they try to portray the narrative that the zombies are evil, when they are the unevolved masses of destructive beings. Use your powers to create zombie hordes to help in your fight.

Key Features:
- Play as the zombie
- Turn humans into zombies
- Create destruction with an interactive world
- Control your zombie underlings in a strategic and tactical way
- Level up your abilities to allow you to control more zombie and learn new tactics

content_descriptors.notes: There is violence in the game between humans and zombies. There are cartoon particle blood particle effects that may affect sensitive gamers.
